Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Property, Special

    public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    The parent of Property and Special. It is a general tile type, who's methods are overwritten in its children
    Author:
    Zaionz

    • Method Detail

      • landedOn

        public void landedOn(Player p,
                     int rollSum,
                     boolean show)
        The function which controls what happens when a tile is landed on
        Parameters:
        p - The player who landed on this Tile
        rollSum - The sum of the die roll, which resulted on this tile being landed on
        show - A boolean stating whether a popup should be displayed

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A ToString() method for tile

        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
